title: Development Plan Delivery and Reform, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Electricity Costs Emergency
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Electricity Costs Emergency 

Benefit Scheme IV Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited electricity cost emergency benefit scheme iv regulation 2024

title: Development Plan Delivery and Reform, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Act of 2024” means the Electricity Costs (Emergency Measures) Domestic 
Accounts Act 2024 (No. 33 of 2024); 

“first payment period” means the period referred to in paragraph (a) of the 
definition of payment period in section 1 of the Act of 2024; 

“second payment period” means the period referred to in paragraph (b) of the 
definition of payment period in section 1 of the Act of 2024.
text_norm: 2 regulation - act 2024 mean electricity cost (emergency measures) domestic account act 2024 (no 33 2024) first payment period mean period referred paragraph (a) definition payment period section 1 act 2024 second payment period mean period referred paragraph (b) definition payment period section 1 act 2024

title: Development Plan Delivery and Reform, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 3. The 22nd of October 2024 is prescribed as the relevant date.
text_raw: 3. The 22nd of October 2024 is prescribed as the relevant date.

title: Development Plan Delivery and Reform, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 4. Each of the following is prescribed to be an effective date:
text_raw:
4. Each of the following is prescribed to be an effective date: 

(a) 

in respect of the first payment period, 30 October 2024; 

(b) 

in respect of the second payment period, 20 December 2024.
text_norm: 4 following prescribed effective date (a) respect first payment period 30 october 2024 (b) respect second payment period 20 december 2024

title: Development Plan Delivery and Reform, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 5. Each of the following is prescribed to be a prescribed period for the
text_raw:
5. Each of the following is prescribed to be a prescribed period for the 

purposes of section 4(1)(f) of the Act of 2024: 

(a) 

(b) 

in respect of the first payment period, the period commencing on 
30 October 2024 and ending on 31 December 2024; 

in respect of the second payment period, the period commencing 
on 20 December 2024 and ending on 31 January 2025.
text_norm: 5 following prescribed prescribed period purpose section 4(1)(f) act 2024 (a) (b) respect first payment period period commencing 30 october 2024 ending 31 december 2024 respect second payment period period commencing 20 december 2024 ending 31 january 2025

title: Development Plan Delivery and Reform, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 6. Each of the following is prescribed to be a prescribed period for the
text_raw:
6. Each of the following is prescribed to be a prescribed period for the 

purposes of section 5(2) of the Act of 2024: 

(a) 

(b) 

in respect of the first payment period, the period commencing on 
1 November 2024 and ending on 31 December 2024; 

in respect of the second payment period, the period commencing 
on 1 January 2025 and ending on 28 February 2025. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[543] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 October, 2024. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 
18 October, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [543]
